official_title: A bill to include in the definition of law enforcement officer contained in title 5, United States Code, employees whose duties include both the investigation, apprehension, or detention of criminals and the protection of human lives and property.

summary.text: Extends the definition of "law enforcement officer," for purposes of civil service retirement, to employees whose duties involve the protection of human life and property and the investigation and apprehension of individuals suspected or convicted of criminal offenses, if such employees are employed by an agency which is responsible for protecting residential properties.

titles.title: A bill to include in the definition of law enforcement officer contained in title 5, United States Code, employees whose duties include both the investigation, apprehension, or detention of criminals and the protection of human lives and property.
